and t1.RECONSTRUCTION_ID_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.reconstructionIdR}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')

and t1.OWNER_ID_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.ownerIdR}),'%')

and t1.UNIFIED_ID_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifiedIdR}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_MODEL_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModelR}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_SPEC_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpecR}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURER_ID_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturerIdR}),'%')
and t1.LIKA_DATE_R >= #{bean.likaDateRBegin}
and t1.LIKA_DATE_R <= #{bean.likaDateREnd}
and t1.ORIGINAL_VALUE_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.originalValueR}),'%')
and t1.EXISTING_PERFORMANCE_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.existingPerformanceR}),'%')
and t1.REFORMING_REASON_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.reformingReasonR}),'%')
and t1.AFTER_PERFORMANCE_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.afterPerformanceR}),'%')
and t1.TRANSFORM_WAY_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.transformWayR}),'%')
and t1.BUDGET_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.budgetR}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 =#{bean.attribute01}
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')

and t1.DEVICE_CATEGORY_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceCategoryR}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_PERSON_R like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByPersonR}),'%')
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc
